Description: You have an engineering degree or proven sound knowledge through professional experience in one of the following disciplines: electrical engineering, communication systems and networks, software development or equivalent.Hands on experience in operations and maintenance of network and communication systems (ideally Linux or Unix systems, Java, IP/Ethernet, firewall, network architecture and radio communications)Fluent in written and spoken EnglishIndependent and solution oriented way of working as well as good communication skillsWilling and able to accept the laws and regulation of different culturesJob Details
